titles: A full account of the apprehending of the Lord Chancellor, in Wapping as he was designing to make his escape: as also the manner how he was brought before the Lord Mayor; and from thence committed to the Tower, December 12. 88.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library, Cambridge, England.
